original_title: Amaraweera, Lasantha, Duminda removed from SLFP positions
original_body_lines: Colombo, March 30 (Daily Mirror)- Ministers Mahinda Amaraweera, Lasantha Alagiyawanna and Duminda Dissanayake were stripped of their positions in the Sri Lanka Freedom Party (SLFP) today.
Dissanayake was the national organizer of the party while Minister Amaraweera held the post of senior Vice President.
